channel.title: .Net Micro Framework on Midnight Programmer

item.title: Getting Started With NETMF And Netduino
item.description: My Netduino card arrived this Sunday but I was not able to play with my new development board due to some serious “crap work” I was doing. Today I was able to run a small piece of code which blinks the user LED on the Netduino board. The code is simple enough and just like “hello world” example like we have for all other programming languages. Here is my Netduino kit:
